resources.string: An error has occurred while fetching subscribed channels.
Unable to check whether user has subscribed to the channel (id=%s)

Import your subscriptions from YouTube, by first visiting https://www.youtube.com/subscription_manager, and clicking the \"Export Subscriptions\" button at the bottom. Then, select the exported file titled \"subscription_manager\" by clicking \"Select Subscriptions File\" below.
Unsubscribe from all your current subscribed channels.
No external channels that you are not already subscribed to were found.
An error was encountered attempting to import the external channels: %s.

Download Extrenal Channels from the Safetoons Server. The downloaded channels will be add to the Subscriptions drawer which is visible to the parent only, and will not be visible to kids until the parent adds them.
Remove all your current downloaded Extrenal Channels.
